metadata.name: Celestial Capsule Gachapon
metadata.description: Dispense a capsule and reveal a randomised reward with dramatic flair.

defaults.title: Celestial Capsule Gachapon
defaults.description: Pull the lever to see what treasure is sealed within the capsule. Every attempt reveals one colourful surprise from the same prize pool.
defaults.capsuleDescription: Every shake builds anticipation before the capsule bursts open to reveal your prize. Hold tight and watch the glow change as the machine prepares your reward.
defaults.prizeShowcaseDescription: Browse every prize currently loaded into the capsule.
defaults.prizeListErrorText: We could not load the prize list. Please refresh to try again.
defaults.attemptErrorText: Something interrupted the gachapon attempt. Please try again.
defaults.defaultFlairText: The capsule cracks open in a burst of light! ðŸŽ‰

prizes.name: Luminous Orb
prizes.description: A softly glowing orb that keeps your camp lit through the night.
prizes.flairText: The orb hums gently as it rolls into your hands.

prizes.name: Ember Charm
prizes.description: A flickering charm that warms nearby allies by a few cozy degrees.
prizes.flairText: Sparks of emberlight trace the capsule as it opens.

prizes.name: Aurora Cape
prizes.description: Shimmers with the northern lights and lets you glide short distances.
prizes.flairText: The cape unfurls with a cascade of aurora hues.

prizes.name: Celestial Compass
prizes.description: Always points toward the nearest secret, no matter where you roam.
prizes.flairText: Starlit runes ignite as the compass clicks into place.

prizes.name: Dragon Heartfire
prizes.description: A fragment of dragon flame that grants a surge of courage to its bearer.
prizes.flairText: A plume of golden flame roars from the capsule's core.
